description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Compete in an awesome stickman deathmatch against your friends or computer controlled bots. Play free-for-all or 2v2 teams through 8 different arenas, 3 featuring spaceships which can be piloted to gain an aerial advantage!
description.short: Compete in an awesome stickman deathmatch against your friends or computer controlled bots. Play free-for-all or 2v2 teams through 8 different arenas, 3 featuring spaceships which can be piloted to gain an aerial advantage!
